with_expander.label: This Page(layout+widgets) has been purely built using Configuration...

widgets.query: SELECT * FROM (VALUES ('Any', [TRUE, FALSE]), ('am', [TRUE]), ('pm', [FALSE]) ) AS t(display_options, is_am_filter);
SELECT  CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 8 DAY AS start_date_filter,CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 1 DAY AS end_date_filter
SELECT cast(sum(total_fatal)as bigint) as total_fatalities FROM crash_cube() where is_am in __is_am_filter__ and crash_day >= '__start_date_filter__' and  crash_day <= '__end_date_filter__'
SELECT cast(sum(total_injured) as bigint) as total_injured FROM crash_cube() where is_am in __is_am_filter__ and crash_day >= '__start_date_filter__' and  crash_day <= '__end_date_filter__'

config.label: Total Injuries
config.help: Total Injuries is number of people injured in the crashes

widgets.query: SELECT sum(total_damage) as total_damage FROM crash_cube() where is_am in __is_am_filter__ and crash_day >= '__start_date_filter__' and  crash_day <= '__end_date_filter__'

SELECT cast(sum(total_people_involved) as bigint) as total_people_involved FROM crash_cube() where is_am in __is_am_filter__ and crash_day >= '__start_date_filter__' and  crash_day <= '__end_date_filter__'

SELECT crash_day,estimate_sketch(union_sketches(sketches)) AS total_crashes from (SELECT crash_day, list(crashes_set_sketch) as sketches FROM crash_cube() where is_am in __is_am_filter__ and crash_day >= '__start_date_filter__' and  crash_day <= '__end_date_filter__' group by crash_day order by crash_day) order by crash_day

WITH total AS ( SELECT crash_day, Estimate_sketch(Union_sketches(List(crashes_set_sketch))) AS total_crashes FROM crash_cube() WHERE is_am IN __is_am_filter__ AND crash_day >= '__start_date_filter__' AND crash_day <= '__end_date_filter__' GROUP BY crash_day), drunk AS ( SELECT crash_day, estimate_sketch(union_sketches(list(crashes_set_sketch))) AS drunk_crashes FROM crash_cube() WHERE is_drunk = true AND is_am IN __is_am_filter__ AND crash_day >= '__start_date_filter__' AND crash_day <= '__end_date_filter__' GROUP BY crash_day) SELECT t.crash_day, t.total_crashes, COALESCE(d.drunk_crashes, 0) AS drunk_crashes, round(100.0 * COALESCE(d.drunk_crashes, 0) / t.total_crashes, 2) AS percent_drunk FROM total t LEFT JOIN drunk d ON t.crash_day = d.crash_day ORDER BY t.crash_day;

WITH total AS ( SELECT crash_day, Estimate_sketch(Union_sketches(List(crashes_set_sketch))) AS total_crashes FROM crash_cube() WHERE is_am IN __is_am_filter__ AND crash_day >= '__start_date_filter__' AND crash_day <= '__end_date_filter__' GROUP BY crash_day), behaviour AS ( SELECT crash_day, estimate_sketch(union_sketches(list(crashes_set_sketch))) AS behaviour_crashes FROM crash_cube() WHERE is_cell_phone_use = true AND is_am IN __is_am_filter__ AND crash_day >= '__start_date_filter__' AND crash_day <= '__end_date_filter__' GROUP BY crash_day) SELECT t.crash_day, t.total_crashes, COALESCE(d.behaviour_crashes, 0) AS behaviour_crashes, round(100.0 * COALESCE(d.behaviour_crashes, 0) / t.total_crashes, 2) AS percent_cell_phone_use FROM total t LEFT JOIN behaviour d ON t.crash_day = d.crash_day ORDER BY t.crash_day;

WITH total AS ( SELECT crash_day, Estimate_sketch(Union_sketches(List(crashes_set_sketch))) AS total_crashes FROM crash_cube() WHERE is_am IN __is_am_filter__ AND crash_day >= '__start_date_filter__' AND crash_day <= '__end_date_filter__' GROUP BY crash_day), behaviour AS ( SELECT crash_day, estimate_sketch(union_sketches(list(crashes_set_sketch))) AS behaviour_crashes FROM crash_cube() WHERE is_hit_run = true AND is_am IN __is_am_filter__ AND crash_day >= '__start_date_filter__' AND crash_day <= '__end_date_filter__' GROUP BY crash_day) SELECT t.crash_day, t.total_crashes, COALESCE(d.behaviour_crashes, 0) AS behaviour_crashes, round(100.0 * COALESCE(d.behaviour_crashes, 0) / t.total_crashes, 2) AS percent_is_hit_run FROM total t LEFT JOIN behaviour d ON t.crash_day = d.crash_day ORDER BY t.crash_day;

SELECT lat, lon FROM crash_cube() where lat IS NOT NULL AND lon IS NOT NULL  AND NOT isnan(lat) AND NOT isnan(lon) and is_am in __is_am_filter__ and crash_day >= '__start_date_filter__' and  crash_day <= '__end_date_filter__' limit 50

SELECT weather_condition, Estimate_sketch(Union_sketches(sketches)) AS total_crashes FROM (SELECT weather_condition, List(crashes_set_sketch) AS sketches FROM crash_cube() WHERE is_am IN __is_am_filter__ AND crash_day >= '__start_date_filter__' AND crash_day <= '__end_date_filter__' GROUP BY weather_condition ORDER BY weather_condition) ORDER BY weather_condition

SELECT gender, estimate_sketch(union_sketches(sketches)) AS total_crashes FROM ( SELECT 'Male' AS gender, list(crashes_set_sketch) AS sketches FROM crash_cube() WHERE is_am in __is_am_filter__ and crash_day >= '__start_date_filter__' AND crash_day <= '__end_date_filter__' AND list_contains(list_of_gender, 'M') GROUP BY gender UNION ALL SELECT 'Female' AS gender, list(crashes_set_sketch) AS sketches FROM crash_cube() WHERE crash_day >= '__start_date_filter__' AND crash_day <= '__end_date_filter__' AND list_contains(list_of_gender, 'F') GROUP BY gender UNION ALL SELECT 'X' AS gender, list(crashes_set_sketch) AS sketches FROM crash_cube() WHERE crash_day >= '__start_date_filter__' AND crash_day <= '__end_date_filter__' AND list_contains(list_of_gender, 'X') GROUP BY gender ) ORDER BY gender;

SELECT age_group, estimate_sketch(union_sketches(sketches)) AS total_crashes FROM ( SELECT 'below_5' AS age_group, list(crashes_set_sketch) AS sketches FROM crash_cube() WHERE is_am in __is_am_filter__ and crash_day >= '__start_date_filter__' AND crash_day <= '__end_date_filter__' AND is_age_below_5 GROUP BY age_group UNION ALL SELECT '10s' AS age_group, list(crashes_set_sketch) AS sketches FROM crash_cube() WHERE crash_day >= '__start_date_filter__' AND crash_day <= '__end_date_filter__' AND is_age_10s GROUP BY age_group UNION ALL SELECT '20s' AS age_group, list(crashes_set_sketch) AS sketches FROM crash_cube() WHERE crash_day >= '__start_date_filter__' AND crash_day <= '__end_date_filter__' AND is_age_20s GROUP BY age_group UNION ALL SELECT '30s' AS age_group, list(crashes_set_sketch) AS sketches FROM crash_cube() WHERE crash_day >= '__start_date_filter__' AND crash_day <= '__end_date_filter__' AND is_age_30s GROUP BY age_group UNION ALL SELECT '40s' AS age_group, list(crashes_set_sketch) AS sketches FROM crash_cube() WHERE crash_day >= '__start_date_filter__' AND crash_day <= '__end_date_filter__' AND is_age_40s GROUP BY age_group UNION ALL SELECT '50s' AS age_group, list(crashes_set_sketch) AS sketches FROM crash_cube() WHERE crash_day >= '__start_date_filter__' AND crash_day <= '__end_date_filter__' AND is_age_50s GROUP BY age_group UNION ALL SELECT 'senior' AS age_group, list(crashes_set_sketch) AS sketches FROM crash_cube() WHERE crash_day >= '__start_date_filter__' AND crash_day <= '__end_date_filter__' AND is_age_senior GROUP BY age_group ) ORDER BY age_group;
